spend001.label: How do you spend your money?
spend001.description: Which one of the following best describes how is your household's total spending compared to total income over the last year?

answers.a: Spending was much less then income
answers.b: Spending was a little less then income
answers.c: Spending was about equal to income
answers.d: Spending was a little more then income
answers.e: Spending was much more then income

spend002.label: How do you pay your bills?
spend002.description: Which one of the following best describes how your household had paid its bills over the last year? My household has beed able to:

answers.a: Pay all of our bills on time
answers.b: Pay nearly all of our bills on time
answers.c: Pay most of our bills on time
answers.d: Pay some of our bills on time
answers.e: Pay very few of our bills on time

save001.label: Do you have money put aside?
save001.description: How long could your household afford to cover your expenses if you had to live on money you have readily available, without selling properties or borrowing?

save002.label: Are you saving enough?
save002.description: How confident are you that your household is doing what it is necessary to achieve your long-term goals such as going on a vacation, buying a home, starting a business, putting money away for retirement, etc.?

answers.a: Very confident/saving enough for our long-term goals
answers.e: Not at all confident/not able to save for long-term goals

borrow001.label: How manageable is your debt?
borrow001.description: As of today, which of the following best describes how manageable your debt is, including mortgages, consumer loans, credit card balances?

answers.b: Have a manageable amount of debt
answers.c: Have a bit more debt than manageable
answers.d: Have far more debt than manageable

borrow002.label: Have you paid your debts on time?
borrow002.description: Have you had any troubles paying your debt in the last 5 years, including your mortgage, consumer loans, credit cards?

answers.a: Haven't had any debt in the last 5 years
answers.c: Have had delays but have sorted them out

plan001.label: Are you sufficiently protected?
plan001.description: How confident are you that the insurance policies you have will provide enough support in case of an emergency such as health issues, car accident, flooding, robbery, disability?

answers.a: We have insurance against all emergencies we can think of
answers.e: We do not have any insurance

plan002.label: Do you plan for the future?
plan002.description: Do you plan ahead your finances?
